 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעַל‎</span> **verb** ==act unfaithfully, treacherously==, a priestly word ([[BDB#P|P]] Ezra, Chronicles), chiefly late (Late Hebrew ***id., act unfaithfully***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***whisper, backbite***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***perfidy, fraud***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעַל‎</span> [[Josh.22.20|Josh 22:20]] + 4 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָֽעֲלָה‎</span> [[Lev.5.21|Lev 5:21]]; [[Num.5.12|Num 5:12]] + 13 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְעַל‎</span> [[Prov.16.10|Prov 16:10]]; [[2Chr.26.16|2Chr 26:16]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְעֹל‎</span> [[Lev.5.15|Lev 5:15]]; [[Num.5.27|Num 5:27]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְעֲלוּ‎</span> [[Josh.7.1|Josh 7:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְעֲלוּ‎</span> [[1Chr.5.25|1Chr 5:25]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְעָ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Neh.1.8|Neh 1:8]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְעֹל‎</span>, so read for HCT <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎למסר‎</span> [[Num.31.16|Num 31:16]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]; — ***act unfaithfully, treacherously***, usually 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעַל מַ֫עַל‎</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּחֵרֶם‎</span> ***in the matter of the devoted thing*** (the sin of Achan) [[Josh.7.1|Josh 7:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.22.20|Josh 22:20]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Lev.5.15|Lev 5:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Chr.36.14|2Chr 36:14]]; [[Ezek.14.13|Ezek 14:13]]; [[Ezek.15.8|Ezek 15:8]]; [[Ezek.18.24|Ezek 18:24]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** wife against (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>) husband [[Num.5.12|Num 5:12]]; [[Num.5.27|Num 5:27]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; marital infidelity). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** elsewhere against (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>) God, [[Lev.26.40|Lev 26:40]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Lev.5.21|Lev 5:21]]; [[Num.5.6|Num 5:6]]; [[Num.31.16|Num 31:16]] (?) [[Josh.22.16|Josh 22:16]]; [[Josh.22.31|Josh 22:31]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.10.13|1Chr 10:13]]; [[1Chr.28.19|1Chr 28:19]]; [[Ezek.17.20|Ezek 17:20]]; [[Ezek.20.27|Ezek 20:27]]; [[Ezek.39.26|Ezek 39:26]]; [[Dan.9.7|Dan 9:7]]. 

**2.** usage without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעַל‎</span> (only late): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎במשׁפט לא ימעל פיו‎</span> [[Prov.16.10|Prov 16:10]] ***let not his*** (the king's) ***mouth act treacherously against justice*** ([[BDB#RV|RV]] ***in judgment***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** elsewhere against God, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, [[Deut.32.51|Deut 32:51]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.5.25|1Chr 5:25]]; [[1Chr.12.2|1Chr 12:2]]; [[1Chr.26.22|1Chr 26:22]]; [[1Chr.30.7|1Chr 30:7]];    without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, [[2Chr.26.18|2Chr 26:18]]; [[2Chr.29.6|2Chr 29:6]]; [[Ezra.10.10|Ezra 10:10]]; [[Neh.1.8|Neh 1:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּחֵרֶם‎</span> [[1Chr.2.7|1Chr 2:7]].
